text: فَقَالُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translation.en: So they said, "Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people
translation.id: Lalu mereka berkata, "Kepada Allahlah kami bertawakal. Ya Tuhan kami, janganlah Engkau jadikan kami (sasaran) fitnah bagi kaum yang zalim
